parameters.name: Logs After
parameters.description: Show log entries for runs executed after the specified one

parameters.name: Logs Before
parameters.description: Show log entries for runs executed before the specified one

parameters.name: Logs But
parameters.description: Show log entries of all runs except the specified one

parameters.name: Fields List Comma
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include in the printed log -- Use the '-l' option to show the list of available fields

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description: Text template used to each record in the log

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Filter log entries by a custom expression e.g. process =~ /foo.*/ && status == 'COMPLETED'

parameters.name: Separate Column Caracter
parameters.description: Character used to separate column values
